channel.title: How to make a shop
channel.description: Ok.. I know how to make a shop in shops .cfg but.. then how do you acess that shop? Like if you just make a shop in shops.cfg then how will the peoples acess it and by clicking on witch npc? Plz help...

item.title: How to make a shop
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

Well you put the npc down and Then put npc id at the shop number if that doesnt work pm me ill work it out for you

Read full topic
